about_the_game:
Fight Back Against the Nightmare

Your quiet town has been overrun by horrifying creatures from another dimension. With nowhere else to turn, you'll need to use your wits and scavenged supplies to survive. Raid the local hardware store to build defenses and traps. Gear up at the gun shop to unleash firepower on the encroaching horde. Find notes left by residents to learn more about the invasion.

Six Nights of Terror

For six terrifying nights, you'll need to strategize, build, and fight your way through relentless waves of increasingly monstrous enemies. Each night brings a new challenge, pushing your ammo count and defenses to the limit. From Them also features an infinite mode, letting you test your mettle against a never-ending onslaught of creatures. Can you survive the endless horde?

Learn by Doing (and Seeing!)

From Them comes with the full Unreal Engine 5 project files, giving you a unique opportunity to see exactly how it was built. Whether you're a complete beginner or someone who likes to poke around, From Them provides valuable insights into the Unreal Engine development process.

Are you ready to defend your town... From Them?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distributions starting with CentOS 7.x
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: A short first person wave defense surrounding mutant creatures invading your town. Collect materials and fire power from the hardware and gun store, build traps to defend yourself, and survive 6 nights. Comes with Unreal Engine 5 project files.
